revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Replacement text for unclear word Stanton and accompanying note.
Proofread and annotate Decoration Day, cancelled do and don't, and postscript
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words
Annotate reference to Gilchrist article in Radical

body.p: i did feel so ansious anxious to hear from you and i cant can't help but feel quite down hearted to hear your thumb is so bad yet i am so sorry for you to have such a tedious long time but i hope you will have it all come right in time but it seemes seems a long time it seemes seems sometimes as if a sore never will get well and then at other times it will heal very quick it is too bad) how doo do you do to write at the office or dontdon't you i wish you could write what the doctor thinks of it and what you put on it but i dont don't want to have you write any extras because i know by the writing it must be difficult for you i long for a letter so bad thinking you will be better the next one

but i hope you will not get discouraged my dear walterWalter for it certainly will get well) i had a letter from Jeff he said they had the radical and was much pleased with the peece piece in it we had a gread great day here on monday Monday as likewise you had in washington Washington decorating the soldiers soldier's graves)

i suppose walterWalter you saw the death of richardRichard huntHunt in the papers he was buried on monday Monday at 2 oclock o'clock at his residence at stantonStanton st i saw it was about 11 in the forenoon and i thought i must go i went up to mytle av Myrtle Ave. and got me a pair of gloves and when i got back i was so lame i had to give it up as i would have to walk several bloks blocks i was afraid to undertake it what ailed him i dont don't know i belive believe his children are all married) i expect georgeGeorge home on saturday Saturday

closer.salute: good bie walterWalter dear dont don't get discoured discouraged

postscript.p: the order has come with many obligations
